org.mym.plog

Class DebugPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mym.plog.AbsPrinter
      • org.mym.plog.DebugPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interceptor, Printer

    public class DebugPrinter
extends AbsPrinter
    Print all message to logcat.

    Note that messages longer than 4K characters will be truncated into parts, to avoid default logcat 4K issue.

    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • onIntercept

        @CheckResult
public boolean onIntercept(int level,
                                        @NonNull
                                        String tag,
                                        @Nullable
                                        Category category,
                                        @NonNull
                                        String msg)
        Description copied from interface: Interceptor
        Decide whether this item of log should be intercepted.
        Specified by:
        onIntercept in interface Interceptor
        Overrides:
        onIntercept in class AbsPrinter
        Parameters:
        level - print level of this log.
        category - category of this log, if specified.
        msg - content of this log(before formatting!). Note if msg in the original request is null, you'll get an empty string here.
        Returns:
        if returns true, this log won't be printed and just be ignored. Otherwise it would be formatted and printed as usual.

      • print

        public void print(int level,
                  @NonNull
                  String tag,
                  @NonNull
                  String msg)
        Description copied from interface: Printer
        Do the real output operation, e.g. call Log.x(), or write to file.
        Parameters:
        level - print level of this log.
        msg - content of this log(already formatted and soft wrapped, if needed).
